required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Role of Endothelin in Pulmonary Hypertension
clinical_study.official_title: The Role of Endothelin in Pulmonary Hypertension

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the study is is to determine the effect, on the lung circulation, of BQ-123, an investigational compound which is not approved by the FDA.

detailed_description.textblock: Endothelin levels are increased in patients with pulmonary hypertension. We wish to compare the effect of an endothelin antagonist on pulmonary hypertension due to a variety of causes.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and time points 2, 3, 4, and 5 (as described in Outcome Measure Description)
primary_outcome.description: PVR will be measured at these 5 time points: 1) Baseline, 2) Hypoxia induced and maintained for 15 min post-baseline at which time the measurement is taken again, 3) Baseline oxygen saturation (Normoxia) reestablished 15 min post-hypoxia period, at which time the measurement is taken again 4) Normoxia measurement taken after BQ-123 administered for 60 min after time point 3, 5) Hypoxia induced and maintained for 15 min after BQ-123 normoxia period, at which time the measurement is taken again.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and time points 2, 3, 4, and 5 (as described in Outcome Measure Description)
secondary_outcome.description: SVR will be measured at these 5 time points: 1) Baseline, 2) Hypoxia induced and maintained for 15 min post-baseline at which time the measurement is taken again, 3) Baseline oxygen saturation (Normoxia) reestablished 15 min post-hypoxia period, at which time the measurement is taken again 4) Normoxia measurement taken after BQ-123 administered for 60 min after time point 3, 5) Hypoxia induced and maintained for 15 min after BQ-123 normoxia period, at which time the measurement is taken again.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and time points 2, 3, 4, and 5 (as described in Outcome Measure Description)
secondary_outcome.description: PAP will be measured at these 5 time points: 1) Baseline, 2) Hypoxia induced and maintained for 15 min post-baseline at which time the measurement is taken again, 3) Baseline oxygen saturation (Normoxia) reestablished 15 min post-hypoxia period, at which time the measurement is taken again 4) Normoxia measurement taken after BQ-123 administered for 60 min after time point 3, 5) Hypoxia induced and maintained for 15 min after BQ-123 normoxia period, at which time the measurement is taken again.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and time points 2, 3, 4, and 5 (as described in Outcome Measure Description)
secondary_outcome.description: CO will be measured at these 5 time points: 1) Baseline, 2) Hypoxia induced and maintained for 15 min post-baseline at which time the measurement is taken again, 3) Baseline oxygen saturation (Normoxia) reestablished 15 min post-hypoxia period, at which time the measurement is taken again 4) Normoxia measurement taken after BQ-123 administered for 60 min after time point 3, 5) Hypoxia induced and maintained for 15 min after BQ-123 normoxia period, at which time the measurement is taken again.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy volunteers or known diagnosis of pulmonary hypertension
Exclusion Criteria:
- hypertension due to other reasons (not pulmonary)

clinical_study.keyword: secondary pulmonary hypertension due to left heart failure
secondary pulmonary hypertension due to other causes
patients without pulmonary disease or pulmonary hypertension

group.title: BQ-123
group.description: BQ-123 (6-120 µg/min) will be administered intravenously.

group.title: BQ-123
group.description: BQ-123 (6-120 µg/min) will be administered intravenously.

outcome.title: Pulmonary Vascular Resistance (PVR)
outcome.description: PVR will be measured at these 5 time points: 1) Baseline, 2) Hypoxia induced and maintained for 15 min post-baseline at which time the measurement is taken again, 3) Baseline oxygen saturation (Normoxia) reestablished 15 min post-hypoxia period, at which time the measurement is taken again 4) Normoxia measurement taken after BQ-123 administered for 60 min after time point 3, 5) Hypoxia induced and maintained for 15 min after BQ-123 normoxia period, at which time the measurement is taken again.
outcome.time_frame: Baseline and time points 2, 3, 4, and 5 (as described in Outcome Measure Description)
outcome.population: Only 19 healthy volunteers completed the study. The study was closed before the 19 patients with established pulmonary hypertension could have data collected.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
